definition: Proletarier aller Länder, vereinigt euch!/Workers of the world, unite!
pinyin: quan2 shi4 jie4 wu2 chan3 zhe3 lian2 he2 qi3 lai5
containing_words.word: 全世界無產者聯合起來

pinyin: yu3 quan2 shi4 jie4 wei2 di2

sentences.english: Jim, and his wife Paige, drive around the world in a modified Mercedes.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆和他的妻子佩奇，推動全世界的改裝奔馳車。

sentences.english: Now the latest intelligence evaluations were being announced worldwide, nearly in real time.
sentences.chinese: 現在最新的情報分析實時地向全世界公佈。

sentences.english: By 1958, new models of transistor radios from Sony sold widely throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 到1958年，索尼新型晶體管收音機銷遍全世界。

sentences.english: The company has since sold more than 1million of the cars around the world.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止公司已經在全世界範圍內售出100萬輛。

sentences.english: But to the persen, you maybe the world.
Millions of people every year view classic works of art in museums all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 每年，全世界數百萬人在博物館觀賞古典藝術作品。

sentences.english: The triumph of Japanese women football team over The U. S. A surprised the world.
sentences.chinese: 日本女足隊戰勝美國隊讓全世界都很驚訝。

sentences.english: I've travelled the world just because I'm bilingual.
sentences.chinese: 我能全世界各地旅行，就是因爲我會兩種語言。

sentences.english: All the panes of glass in the world today cover about four billion square metres.
sentences.chinese: 如今全世界所有玻璃板總計約有四十億平方米。

sentences.english: The engineering of the electron-positron collider that we have completed also ranks among the world's most advanced technologies.
sentences.chinese: 我們的正負電子對撞機工程在全世界也是居於前列的。

sentences.english: Sometimes, only one person is missing, and the whole world seems depopulated.
sentences.chinese: 有時，不過是一個人的去世，卻似乎是全世界的損失。

sentences.english: I've been doing this job for 28 years, with armies all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 我幹這一行已經28年了，隨着軍隊走遍了全世界。

sentences.english: In space exploration and Earth observation, you have capabilities around the world.
sentences.chinese: 在空間探索和地球觀測方面，你可集合全世界力量。

sentences.english: The global server of the best results will allow you to show your results to whole world!
sentences.chinese: 如果你玩出好成績，就會向全世界宣告的。

sentences.english: The first is freedom of speech and expression -- everywhere in the world.
sentences.chinese: 第一是在全世界任何地方發表言論和表達意見的自由。

sentences.english: 'Our goal remains to be No. 1, ' said Mr. Saso, the Fujitsu executive.
sentences.chinese: 富士通的佐相秀幸說，我們的目標是全世界第一。

definition: all over the world/everywhere/in all parts of the world
Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
throughout the United States/the whole of America
